title: Workplace Language Competency Enhancement Program Through Work-Based E-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Ability to understand basic workplace documents and proficiency in using basic digital devices
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited technological environments, requiring learning designs reflecting symbolic interactions and daily work contexts within organizations

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize over 80% of specialized terminology required in workplace situations.
Learners can explain processes for resolving workplace language issues through symbolic interactions with peers.
Learners can propose measures to reduce practical language barriers by over 50% using formal/informal communication channels within organizations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
